name: Ye Olde Space Opera
description: The Hysperian Space Faire is a chance, according to Queen Paolana, to celebrate their rich cultural heritage - and a chance for her to convince her son to return. But when the galaxy gets roped into this farce, will you be ready to play your part?
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Voyages in one phase, and Ship Battles in another phase.
-- In the Voyage Phase, you will engage in Voyages with ocassional Voyage Encounters that will test proficiencies of your voyage crew.
-- Unique Ship Battles are available during Phase 2. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Hemmer, Paolana, Picard, or Costumed crew will provide a bonus to antimatter and to passively gained Victory Points during the Voyage Phase, as well as bonus to Ship Battles during the Skirmish Phase.
-- Using the Monaveen, the Dove, or the Klingon K't'inga Battlecruiser will provide a bonus to antimatter during the Voyage Phase, as well as bonus to hull during the Skirmish Phase.
-- Using ships with the Explorer trait will provide a bonus to antimatter during the Voyage Phase.
-- In the Voyage Phase you earn Event Victory Points passively by running a voyage, and actively by winning contests during Voyage Encounters.
-- In the Skirmish Phase every Ship Battle you complete earns you Event Victory Points. 
-- Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Bonus: Explorer (ship trait for Voyage Phase), Hemmer, Paolana, Picard, Costumed

featured_crew.name: V'Las
featured_crew.flavor: Head of the Vulcan High Command, but ultimately a collaborator in a Romulan conspiracy where he intended to invade Andoria.

action.name: You've Failed. Decades of Work Have Been Lost.

featured_crew.name: Paolana
featured_crew.flavor: Paolana was ready for any tricks to fix her son and force him to take the throne.

action.name: A Meager Price To Pay To Get You On The Throne

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Picard
rewards.flavor: Captain of the legendary U.S.S. Enterprise-D, Captain Picard was key to many of the Federation's successes.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: B. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Basic Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

ship.name: Klingon K't'inga Battlecruiser
ship.flavor: A follow up to the powerful D7 Battlecruiser, the K't'inga Class was the primary warship of the Klingon Empire in the late 23rd century.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

action.name: You've Failed. Decades of Work Have Been Lost.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.

Time Portal Pack: 0.13%

Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

screens.text: "Come one, come all, to the Hysperian Space Faire! I know you'll find our rich cultural heritage of mirth and mayhem lends itself nicely to a fair with something for everyone! I would like to extend a special invitation to the crew of the Cerritos and my dear son, Andarithio."

"We invite bold knights, daring damsels, and jolly jesters of all crests and creeds to compete in our intergalactic tournament, where the mightiest warrior will be offered anything they desire - especially if it's the hand of my son, Andarithio!"

"Mother! I told you! My home is here on the Cerritos, I have no interest in ascending the throne. Ohh. She is not going to let this go. Captain, I need to ask you a favor. I can count on you, right? Think you can win this contest and pass on the whole marriage thing?"

"It's going to be a bumpy ride. She has these matches and challenges set throughout the solar system and judging from the vague nature of the rules, I believe we can expect more than a few surprises. Take heed, Captain."

"Come one, come all, to the Hysperian Space Faire! I know you'll find our rich cultural heritage of mirth and mayhem lends itself nicely to a fair with something for everyone! I would like to extend a special invitation to the crew of the Cerritos and my dear son, Andarithio."

"We invite bold knights, daring damsels, and jolly jesters of all crests and creeds to compete in our intergalactic tournament, where the mightiest warrior will be offered anything they desire - especially if it's the hand of my son, Andarithio!"

"Mother! I told you! My home is here on the Cerritos, I have no interest in ascending the throne. Ohh. She is not going to let this go. Captain, I need to ask you a favor. I can count on you, right? Think you can win this contest and pass on the whole marriage thing?"

"It's going to be a bumpy ride. She has these matches and challenges set throughout the solar system and judging from the vague nature of the rules, I believe we can expect more than a few surprises. Take heed, Captain."
"Splendid, splendid! Well done, Captain! I suppose I shouldn't have underestimated you stodgy old Starfleet-types after all."

"Mother, could you please avoid embarrassing me in front of my colleagues for once? Though she isn't wrong. In all the tournaments and competitions I've been forced to sit through, you made this one to remember, Captain."

responses.text: "I don't remember agreeing to any extra phase."
"Only if someone will sing songs of my valiant deeds."

screens.text: "I'm glad to hear you say that, son. Thanks to the Captain's ability to put on such a good show, we've decided to extend our little event into a new phase."

"Oh, don't sound so panicked. We'll stick to something a little more familiar to you. How about a series of grand duels between your vessel and several of our other challengers? I'm sure your ship can handle it, yes?"

"You should probably reread that liability waiver she made you sign. I know, that parchment's a pain and most people just rush through those things, but as I'm sure you've figured out by now, my mother has doublespeak and loopholes down to a science."
"Leave it to me, Captain. Spock always was trying to get me to take up the lute and the Hysperians have been teaching me."
"I'm counting on you, Captain!"
"Splendid, splendid! Well done, Captain! I suppose I shouldn't have underestimated you stodgy old Starfleet-types after all."

"Mother, could you please avoid embarrassing me in front of my colleagues for once? Though she isn't wrong. In all the tournaments and competitions I've been forced to sit through, you made this one to remember, Captain."

responses.text: "I don't remember agreeing to any extra phase."
"Only if someone will sing songs of my valiant deeds."

screens.text: "I'm glad to hear you say that, son. Thanks to the Captain's ability to put on such a good show, we've decided to extend our little event into a new phase."

"Oh, don't sound so panicked. We'll stick to something a little more familiar to you. How about a series of grand duels between your vessel and several of our other challengers? I'm sure your ship can handle it, yes?"

"You should probably reread that liability waiver she made you sign. I know, that parchment's a pain and most people just rush through those things, but as I'm sure you've figured out by now, my mother has doublespeak and loopholes down to a science."
"Leave it to me, Captain. Spock always was trying to get me to take up the lute and the Hysperians have been teaching me."
"I'm counting on you, Captain!"
